Name: Alles voor de lunch
Review Text: Perfect, when you need perfection the most. The sandwiches came fast, packed in foil (touch only the foil when choosing the sandwich), clear description about the type of sandwich on the label, vegan delivered separate from the rest. The â€¦

Name: Alles voor de lunch
Review Text: Sandwiches are disgusting. So much sauce is ridiculous, and I love it normally. The wait is insane, it seems like they don't understand how to work in a line. I waited 10 minutes inside before they took my order. I will never come back here.

Name: Alles voor de lunch
Review Text: Decent prices, good quality food and excellent service. Definitely explains the lines when ordering.

Name: Alles voor de lunch
Review Text: Great sandwich shop with amazing prices. A staple for lunch when I am in the office.

Name: Alles voor de lunch
Review Text: Great place to get your daily take away lunch sandwich. Also soups and other stuff. I love it

Name: Alles voor de lunch
Review Text: I just moved to the neighborhood, and tried their sandwiches for lunch. They are excellent and really cheap for Amsterdam!

Name: Alles voor de lunch
Review Text: This is a wonderful little lunch shop that has a variety of sandwiches and salads! The ingredients are fresh, and they are quite accomodating to your wishes. Also, really affordable!

Name: Alles voor de lunch
Review Text: My favorites: croissant with cheese, carpaccio, beenham, goat cheese

Name: Alles voor de lunch
Review Text: Delicious small salads and sandwiches for a great price. And the staff is lovely.

Name: Alles voor de lunch
Review Text: Good sandwiches and very tasty salads. Not very expensive. Good deal!
